item.title: Erm simple autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

I made one to you…

btw, here is it.

[code]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// This script is made by Tarantula [www.moparisthebest.com] //
// //
// To run this script… //
// 1. Set Lines 16-18 //
// 2. Run the script with hotkeys [Recommended] //
// //
// START = [CTRL + ALT + R] //
// PAUSE = [CTRL + ALT + A] //
// STOP = [CTRL + ALT + S] //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SimpleClickerByTarantula;

const
x=(300); {This is x coordinate}
y=(200); {This is y coordinate}
WaitTime=(200); {This is the wait time after each click}

procedure a;
begin
clickmouse(x,y, true);
wait(WaitTime);
end;

begin
repeat
a;
until(false)
end.[/code]

~Tarantula

Read full topic

item.title: Erm simple autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

const
x:= 123;//x coordinate
y:=321;// y coordinate
begin
repeat
wait(1300+390)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
until(iskeydown('g'))
end.

that will simply click on x,y until your press the key ‘g’.

Read full topic
